channel.title: Scape-2006
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[i]Official release is Saturday.[/i]
[url=http://www.scape2006.org]Website[/url] [IMG]http://im2.ezgif.com/tmp/ezgif-2740494085.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bPDj8rh.png[/img]
[SIZE=3][B]Welcome to the Scape-2006 Project Thread! [/B]
I have been working on this server for over two years now. Recently, I've put very heavy development into making this remake better, and more appealing to players. I will be updating this thread whenever I can, or after I've finished something within the server. These updates will usually be posted every 2-3 days. Without further ado, let's get into the thread.[/SIZE]
[U][B]Quests[/B][/U]
[SPOILER=View Quests][COLOR="#FF8C00"][B][SIZE=3]FREE-TO-PLAY QUESTS[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [SIZE=2][COLOR=green]Black Knights' Fortress Cook's Assistant Demon Slayer Doric's Quest Dragon Slayer[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Ernest the Chicken[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Goblin Diplomacy Imp Catcher The Knight's Sword Pirate's Treasure[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Prince Ali Rescue[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]The Restless Ghost Romeo & Juliet Rune Mysteries Quest Sheep Shearer[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Shield of Arrav[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Vampire Slayer Witch's Potion[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR="#FF8C00"][B][SIZE=3]MEMBERS QUESTS[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [SIZE=2][COLOR=GREEN]Clock Tower Death Plateau Elemental Workshop Fishing Contest Gertrude's Cat The Grand Tree The Hand in the Sand Lost City Monkey Madness Monk's Friend[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Mountain Daughter[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Plague City[/color] [COLOR=green]Priest in Peril[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Scorpion Catcher[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Sheep Herder Tree Gnome Village Waterfall Quest[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Witch's House[/COLOR][/SIZE][/SPOILER]
[U][B]Miniquests[/B][/U]
[SPOILER=View Miniquests][SIZE=2][COLOR=green]Tutorial Island Mage of Zamorak miniquest Mage Arena[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Barcrawl[/color][/SIZE][/SPOILER]
[U][B]Minigames[/B][/U]
[SPOILER=View Minigames][SIZE=2][COLOR=green]Duel Arena[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Fight Pits[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Fight Caves[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Pest Control Castle Wars [90% Finished][/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Fishing Trawler[/COLOR][/SIZE][/SPOILER]
[U][B]Random Events[/B][/U]
[SPOILER=View Random Events][COLOR=green][SIZE=2]Genie Drunken dwarf[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]ScapeRune[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Ent tree Explosive mining rocks[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Quiz Random Event[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Mime Random Event[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Flying pickaxe heads Flying axe heads Whirlpool fishing Big fish stealing equipment Evil chicken Freaky Forester[/color] [color=green]River troll Rock golem Shade Spirit tree Zombie[/COLOR][/SIZE][/SPOILER]
[U][B]Notable Content[/B][/U]
[SPOILER=View Notable Content][SIZE=2]Clue Scrolls Fixed - 100% functional. 31 Completed Quests Fully functional Dwarf Cannon Cats - Feeding, stroking, chasing vermin, and growing. Skillcapes (No emotes) - All skills working(Except for Farming - GameObject handling is buggy) - Lots of miscellaneous content and fine details have been added across the game! (For the nostalgic 2006 feel) - Very customizable in-game client features - 200+ Shops with correct item stocks and prices - Full Tutorial Island - Corrected Dialogues - Flawless Random Events - Full Banning System (Supports MAC, UID, and IP banning!) - Chat logs/PM logs/Trade logs/Pickup logs - XML Player Saving - Backup saving - Region Music + 100% working music player - Dupe free - Cheat Engine exploits fixed (banking) - Skill level-up dialogues, showing what you've unlocked after certain levels.[/SIZE] [/SPOILER]
[B][U]Media[/U][/B] [SPOILER=View Media] [SPOILER=Dwarf Cannon][IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/632d778f220c6951f47548702a613b74.gif[/img][/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Client Customizability]459 Side Icon toggling [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/9c8fd91f9bdccaaca829ed664e5755b7.gif[/img]
Small Font EXP Drops: [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/c066e9d625f4f924b29d7d29020033a2.jpg[/img]
Large Font EXP Drops: [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/bbe0cecd86c76d13918667ce0293e589.jpg[/img]
Mouse & Scrollwheel Movement [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/44e912af59a2ef2d40783fd4b323925d.gif[/img]
Zoom-out [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/748a0669f7b9a3b283611517881d4bbb.png[/img]
Zoom-in [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/10f9f8b5e28cf3fbb3b14d11d6848aff.png[/img]
Top right corner EXP Counter/EXP Drops [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/76573c1e86bd574f8b279f6aaa12db7d.png[/img]
Centered EXP Counter/EXP Drops [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/cbe2d9d4ce7c5fd2d4417a5a2d850062.png[/img]
Toggleable EXP Counter [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/345e433e77bf1c1ddb011d8816d8afb7.png[/img]
Saving Account Credentials [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/818bdde349e9e39d0d59178b8159c48d.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Misc] [IMG]http://puu.sh/onukC/3ad7965131.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/onv6O/20e7628634.jpg[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/98b251fb94af35e966eb701a03044193.gif[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/olMsp/04f765af0d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fRyFUvT.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/4160ad199c7fa7bf8dc4c1e6de5c4b9b.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/a3b03263dfc999c3eab665a4b49f7895.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/559ce80e1653a83e8050a3cb382d6407.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/e6bedb459821f5a10183de34a7d10ccd.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/a7b7188924e4bd614d438ce1e35c64a1.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/c6b6eaa3ec2a1e820fd22ffd83a9bcd1.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/54be413950d34ab2c7b939bc13b41356.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/fef26d26ed032cfe2914a58396adda0e.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/151147e7be49f384de2481edd6c4bb00.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/1ec99f1534035cb1a57368a067438880.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/d60f734f830399dd481976a204cd8449.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Cats][IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/dd2e849269998643fcf33ca8e023dd86.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/636602d521671fb36b7fbb5e49aefede.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/74586c435162bed288dc344f918dabe8.png[/img][/SPOILER] [/SPOILER]
[SIZE=3]Thanks for reading![/SIZE]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Scape-2006
item.dc:creator: @my-swagger my-swagger
item.description:
@my-swagger wrote:

Soulcist:

I’m really liking that homepage and forum theme used, nice going on that one. As for the server itself, I suppose it’s fine that there is yet another one made out where but what’s the point? While I understand you’re doing it to feel the nostalgia from that era, OSRS is doing a fine job with their game already. Not to mention that you may not get the playerbase that you’re ever so wanting.

They need to give proper credits though: https://www.rune-server.org/programming/website-development/downloads/627329-homepage-release.html
Just changed images.

Read full topic

item.title: Scape-2006

I’m really liking that homepage and forum theme used, nice going on that one. As for the server itself, I suppose it’s fine that there is yet another one made out where but what’s the point? While I understand you’re doing it to feel the nostalgia from that era, OSRS is doing a fine job with their game already. Not to mention that you may not get the playerbase that you’re ever so wanting.

item.title: Scape-2006
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

This is nice, but I don’t see what this offers that 07 doesn’t, especially since the xp rate is probably aids

Read full topic

item.title: Scape-2006
item.dc:creator: @flave flave
item.description:
@flave wrote:

Servers up with a regular player base of 40+, no major bugs with minor ones being fixed incredibly quickly. All in all, the most responsive staff team I’ve seen on a remake - real potential here.

Read full topic

item.title: Scape-2006
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

[CENTER]

Official release is Saturday.

Website

bPDj8rh.png690×877

[SIZE=3]Welcome to the Scape-2006 Project Thread!

I have been working on this server for over two years now. Recently, I’ve put very heavy development into making this remake better, and more appealing to players.
I will be updating this thread whenever I can, or after I’ve finished something within the server. These updates will usually be posted every 2-3 days.
Without further ado, let’s get into the thread.[/SIZE]

Quests

[SPOILER=View Quests][COLOR="#FF8C00"][SIZE=3]FREE-TO-PLAY QUESTS[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=2][COLOR=green]Black Knights’ Fortress
Cook’s Assistant
Demon Slayer
Doric’s Quest
Dragon Slayer[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Ernest the Chicken[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Goblin Diplomacy
Imp Catcher
The Knight’s Sword
Pirate’s Treasure[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Prince Ali Rescue[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]The Restless Ghost
Romeo & Juliet
Rune Mysteries Quest
Sheep Shearer[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Shield of Arrav[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Vampire Slayer
Witch’s Potion[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR="#FF8C00"][SIZE=3]MEMBERS QUESTS[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=2][COLOR=GREEN]Clock Tower
Death Plateau
Elemental Workshop
Fishing Contest
Gertrude’s Cat
The Grand Tree
The Hand in the Sand
Lost City
Monkey Madness
Monk’s Friend[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Mountain Daughter[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Plague City[/color]
[COLOR=green]Priest in Peril[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Scorpion Catcher[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Sheep Herder
Tree Gnome Village
Waterfall Quest[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Witch’s House[/COLOR][/SIZE][/SPOILER]

Miniquests

[SPOILER=View Miniquests][SIZE=2][COLOR=green]Tutorial Island
Mage of Zamorak miniquest
Mage Arena[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Barcrawl[/color][/SIZE][/SPOILER]

Minigames

[SPOILER=View Minigames][SIZE=2][COLOR=green]Duel Arena[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Fight Pits[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Fight Caves[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Pest Control
Castle Wars [90% Finished][/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Fishing Trawler[/COLOR][/SIZE][/SPOILER]

Random Events

[SPOILER=View Random Events][COLOR=green][SIZE=2]Genie
Drunken dwarf[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]ScapeRune[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Ent tree
Explosive mining rocks[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Quiz Random Event[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Mime Random Event[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Flying pickaxe heads
Flying axe heads
Whirlpool fishing
Big fish stealing equipment
Evil chicken
Freaky Forester[/color]
[color=green]River troll
Rock golem
Shade
Spirit tree
Zombie[/COLOR][/SIZE][/SPOILER]

Notable Content

[SPOILER=View Notable Content][SIZE=2]Clue Scrolls Fixed - 100% functional.
31 Completed Quests
Fully functional Dwarf Cannon
Cats - Feeding, stroking, chasing vermin, and growing.
Skillcapes (No emotes)

  • All skills working(Except for Farming - GameObject handling is buggy)
  • Lots of miscellaneous content and fine details have been added across the game! (For the nostalgic 2006 feel)
  • Very customizable in-game client features
  • 200+ Shops with correct item stocks and prices
  • Full Tutorial Island
  • Corrected Dialogues
  • Flawless Random Events
  • Full Banning System (Supports MAC, UID, and IP banning!)
  • Chat logs/PM logs/Trade logs/Pickup logs
  • XML Player Saving
  • Backup saving
  • Region Music + 100% working music player
  • Dupe free
  • Cheat Engine exploits fixed (banking)
  • Skill level-up dialogues, showing what you’ve unlocked after certain levels.[/SIZE]
    [/SPOILER]

Media
